messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a horde of wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Massive bue

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Maintenance.
